episodesJson.title: SHORTS - Do We Really Have To Say Goodbye?
episodesJson.description: This week, we talked about the short film Do We Really Have to Say Goodbye, a gay covid tale with a twist ending that's so short we padded it out with a list of movies Chris has cried at on planes. It's weirder than you think.
topics: Movies Chris has cried at on planes
Speaking of planes, who gave Baloo the Bear flight technology?
